item.title: A Weakening U.S. Dollar Worries Film and TV Producers in Canada
item.description: The link between the Canadian and U.S. currencies is straightforward: Hollywood comes north when the greenback is strong, and weighs going elsewhere when it falls in value.

item.title: Shannon Sharpe Settles $50 Million Rape Lawsuit
item.description: The lawsuit accused Sharpe of assaulting a woman at her Las Vegas home. A lawyer for the accuser acknowledged that the two had a “long-term consensual and tumultuous relationship.”
